derivation: from a derivative of a compound of G435 (ἀνδραποδιστής) and G4228 (ἀνδραποδιστής);
strongs_def: an enslaver (as bringing men to his feet)
outline:
1. a slave-dealer, kidnapper, man-stealer
    1. of one who unjustly reduces free men to slavery
    2. of one who steals the slaves of others and sells them
